Translations.Text: Dayutʹ harna novyna tsym khto vvazhayutʹ ta pryzvodyatʹ spravedlyvi dovichni shcho vony budutʹ maty park z techuchymy potokamy. Koly zabezpechenyy zabezpechennyam fruktiv tam, vony skazhutʹ, "Tse shcho vkhodylo do kompetentsiyi yakshcho dlya nas ranishe." Otzhe, vony dayutʹsya alehorychni opys. Vony budutʹ maty chyste podruzhzhya tam, ta vony perebuyutʹ tam zavzhdy

BOH ne boyazkyy v inshe mistse z tsytuyuchoho budʹ-yakoho riznovydu alehoriyi, z tiny komarya ta bilʹshoho. Yak dlya tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ, vony znayutʹ shcho tse yavlyaye soboyu pravdu z yikhnʹoho Lorda. Yak dlya tsykh khto disbelieve, yak kazhutʹ, "Shcho BOH oznachav takoyu alehoriyeyu?" Vin pryzvodytʹ do pomylky bahato z dopomohoyu tsʹoho, ta dovidnyky bahato z dopomohoyu tsʹoho. Ale Vin nikoly ne pryzvodytʹ do pomylky z dopomohoyu tsʹoho krim bezputnyy
khto porushuyutʹ BOZHU domovlenistʹ pislya toho yak zastavlyaty uphold tse, roz'yednuyutʹ yakoho BOHA nakazalo buty vstuplene do, ta zdiysnyuyutʹ zlo. Tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu losers

Yak vy disbelieve u BOHU koly vy mozhete mertvyy ta Vin mozhe dav vam zhyttya, todi Vin mozhe stavytʹ vas do smerti, todi Vin mozhe prynosytʹ vam nazad do zhyttya, todi yomu vy ostatochno mozhete povernutysya
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto stvoryuvav dlya vas vse na zemli, todi povernulosya do neba ta perfected sim vsesvitu tam, ta Vin znaye tsilkom vsi rechi
